scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env BUILD_TYPE=production node fuse.js && cp -R ./src/webpage/static ./dist/
scripts.build:debug: npm run clean && cross-env BUILD_TYPE=build-debug node fuse.js && cp -R ./src/webpage/static ./dist/
scripts.test: npm run clean && cross-env BUILD_TYPE=test node fuse.js
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env BUILD_TYPE=dev node fuse.js
scripts.dev:production: npm run clean && cross-env BUILD_TYPE=dev:production node fuse.js
